completions.nl_description: Move all objects of color different than O, toward the closest object of color O.
Move all objects towards the nearest object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than O, up to the maximum degree, and recolor the objects of color C to the color of the object they neighbored.
Move all objects toward the diagonal light blue objects, if they are neighbors of the diagonal light blue objects.
Move all objects toward the nearest object of the same color if they are neighbors.
Move all objects one step to the right and then recolor them to color C.
Move all objects of color C towards the nearest non-C object, and then update their color to C at the new location.
Move all objects of color different than O, towards the object of the same color, if they are neighbors of someone of the same color.
Add a small object of color C next to all existing objects of color W.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter (color_equals (color_of this) W))
        (apply (insert 1 top_right source))
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Move all 'C' color objects to the bottom left direction.
Add color C pixels between neighboring objects colored C with the same alignment.
Move all objects towards objects of color C if they are neighbors.
Move all objects of color different than C, toward the nearest object of color C if they are neighbors, and only if they are not already in contact with an object of color C.
Move all objects of color different than C, toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects towards objects of color C if they are neighbors, and recolor them with color C.
Move all objects of color different than C towards the closest object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Insert object C at the location of neighbors of C objects.
Move objects one step towards an object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Recolor the neighbors of W and R objects to C and G respectively.
Move all objects that are not color C toward the object of color C if they are neighbors, then update them to color C.
Move all objects one step towards the closest column to the center that contains color C.
Move any object that is a neighbor of an object of color C one step toward it.
Move all objects of color different than O, toward the nearest object of color O, if they are neighbors of it.
Color a pixel as C if it is vertically aligned with pixels of color C
Insert a new object of color C at the bottom of objects of color different than O.
Move all objects one step towards the nearest object of the same color of maximum size.
Change the color of all cells that are immediate neighbors of an object of color C or R (center to center distance of one), to the color of the corresponding neighboring object.
Move all objects of color different than C, toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Add a node with color C to objects if they have more than one neighbor of color C.
Move all objects not of color C, that are neighbors of objects of color C, towards the C objects.
Move all objects one step towards neighboring objects of color C.
Move all objects of color different than C, toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects towards the nearest cyan object if they are neighbors, until they hit another object.
Move all objects of size 1 toward an object of size 1 of a different color, if they are neighbors.
Move all objects of color C towards the nearest object of color W.
Move all objects of color other than C, toward the objects of color C, if they are neighbors of them, then replace any cell not colored by the movement with C.
Move all objects of color C towards the bottom-right.
Recolor the objects that are neither the color C nor neighbors of objects of size max, to color C.
Recolor all cells around objects to color C.
Move all objects towards the right, except those of color C
Reposition objects to enhance their size with color C, if neighboring.
Move all objects of color Y toward the right. Recolor the objects to color C if they are neighbors of an object of color C.
Recolor all objects to color C, except objects of color W.
Move the cells in the direction of the given object
Insert a green color between neighbors if the color is not green.
Move all objects of color different than O towards the nearest object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Insert a green pixel diagonally to the right of all C objects.
Move all the 'C' colored objects towards the center colored objects, then change the moved 'C' colored objects to 'O' colored.
Move all objects of size 1 towards the nearest object of size greater than 1.
Recolor all objects that are neighbors of another object to color C.
Move all objects neighboring the object of color C toward it.
Color all cells between C and W with C.
Change the color of 'C' objects when they are neighbors of 'W', 'R', or 'G' objects.
Move all objects of color different than 'O' and 'X' one step down and recolor all neighbors of 'C' to 'C'.
Recolor the object in the right and down of each object C.
Move objects adjacent to the cyan object toward it.
Move all objects of color G toward the object of color Y if they are neighbors of it, and then recolor them to color G.
Move objects of color different than O to form rows and then recolor the entire row to the same color as the object in that row.
Recolor the objects neighboring C to color C.
Move all objects of color different than C towards the nearest object of color C, if they are neighbors.
Move all objects diagonally down-right to an immediate empty space if they neighbor a cell of the same color.
Move neighboring objects toward the C object along the diagonal, then recolor them to C.
Move objects of color different than C to the nearest object of color C if they are neighbors of it.
Recolor the object horizontally or vertically adjacent to 'C' to 'C'.
Move all objects towards objects of color Y and recolor them to Y if they are neighbors.
Recolor all empty cells that are neighbors of an object, to the color of that object.
Move all objects of color different than C, toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Color the cells between columns if they neighbor cells of different color.
Move all objects of color C one step towards their closest horizontal or vertical neighbor of any other non-black color.
Move all W colored objects near another non-W colored object to a new location next to any C colored object.
Move all objects of color C and G toward the nearest object of color different than C and G.
Move all objects of color C toward the nearest W object, if they are neighbors, without overlapping.
Move all blue objects one step towards cyan objects and recolor them cyan.
Move all non-C objects towards a closest C object if they are neighbors and recolor them as C objects.
Move all objects neighboring an object of color C towards it, and recolor them to the color C.
Move the objects of color C to cover the positions of all O cells they are aligned with.
Duplicate all objects of color C, placing the duplicate adjacent to the original object.
Recolor the neighboring cells of the smallest sized object having color W to color of the smallest sized object.
Move all objects of size 1 toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors, without overlapping.
Move objects of color different than C towards objects of color C if they are neighbors.
Move all objects of color different than C, toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color G toward the object of color different from O, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects that are neighbors of color C one step towards the nearest C, and then recolor the path to color C.
Move all objects of color different than C, toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color 'C' towards their nearest neighbor and modify their color to be the same as the neighboring color
Move all objects of color C towards the up-direction by one step.
Move all uniquely colored objects one step toward any neighboring object of same color and recolor the target cell.
Color all cells in the shape of Cs and move the neighboring objects of color G to the nearest cells.
Move all objects of color different than C, toward the object of color C if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color C one step down.
Move all objects of color C, toward the object of color W, if they are neighbors of it and then recolor them to G.
For every object, if it is a neighbor of one or more objects colored G, recolor all such neighboring G objects to color C.
Move all objects towards the nearest objects of color C until they are adjacent. Each object of color C does not move.
Move all objects of size 1 to the nearest object of size greater than 1 and change their color to match the target object.
Insert objects of color C, in the position of neighboring objects.
Move all objects in columns that are neighbors of another object in a center column, towards the object in the center column.
Move all single objects of color C toward their neighboring object in the direction of same color C.
Recolor all objects of size 3 to color C.
For all objects colored X, change their color to C.
Move all objects one step closer to the nearest object of color C.
Move all objects of color different than C, toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Recolor all cells touched by an object to color C
Add a green pixel on each side of an object of color C if the pixel is neighbored by both the object and another object.
Color the cells surrounding the color C objects with color C.
Move all objects of color different than C, toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Recolor all pixels located directly below each cyan pixel that does not already have a cyan pixel below to cyan.
Recolor all cells adjacent to any cell of color C to color C.
Move all objects towards the nearest object of color C if they are neighbors, until they hit another object.
Move all C-colored objects towards W-colored if they are neighbors, then convert all C-colored objects to O-color.
Recolor all objects such that adding a line of color C in their center columns, from their top boundary to their bottom boundary.
